name: Alone (itch) (Rap27)
description:
Alone is a game where you play as a socially anxious person trying to enjoy a party. The main mechanic of the game is finding a balance between keeping your social anxiety in check but also socializing enough before the party ends. 

1. Try to collect all the hearts until the party ends.

2. Avoid people to not increase your anxiety too much.

This project was made with 2 other students at University.
